posts.post_content:
It's been a really long time since I added any Obaks to my collection. I will pay extremely well for nice examples!


Seeking the following T212-1 1909 Obaks:

Charlie Graham, Sacramento
R. Williams, San Francisco
Carl Lewis, Oakland


Seeking the following T212-2 1910 Obaks:

Claude Berry, San Francisco, P.C.L.
Mickey LaLonge, Sacramento, P.C.L.
Carl Lewis, Vancouver, N.W.L.

 
Seeking the following T212-3 1911 Obaks:

Tom Hasty, Spokane, N.W.L.
Mickey LaLonge, Sacramento, P.C.L.
Carl Lewis, Vancouver, N.W.L.
Carl Mitze, Oakland, P.C.L.
William Pearce, Oakland, PC.L.
Walter Schmidt, San Francisco, P.C.L.
Hugh Smith, Los Angeles, P.C.L.
Matt Spiesman, Vancouver, N.W.L.

Thanks in advance,

Patrick
